Articles.Content:
Is there an archive of all the flights I have performed so far, with a summary of the logs? (I know when I crash, there is a mission log for that particular mission).

If not, is that a planned feature? I think it really improves immersion (plus I want make things realistic and not send Jeb on all my missions, letting him get some rest in between, so knowing the pilots on each mission, and what they achieved is useful).
There is no in-game log, and I don't believe anything like that is planned. Looks like you'll need to make it yourself. Unless somebody can suggest a mod?

For now, you're on your own. I suggest making a spreadsheet (Calc, Excel or whatever you use) file for each savegame. Helps immersion a bit and really eases the headaches from trying to remember where that probe was supposed to be headed again...
I've been thinking about making a "history of your space program" mod but I don't really have time to take on the project.
